extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: APSC 172, APSC 174, MTHE 280 (or MATH 280) and registered in BSCE

basic.description: Taylor's theorem, optimization, implicit and inverse function theorems. Elementary topology of Euclidean spaces. Sequences and series of numbers and functions. Pointwise and uniform convergence. Power series.
basic.subject: MTHE
basic.title: Introduction To Real Analysis
